resources.string: This is a modify version of Snake from the android SDK.\nCopyright (C) 2007 The Android Open Source Project\nModify by Paul Sohier, 2010

This is a modified version of Snake from the android SDK. Controlling can be done with the gyroscope or trackpad from your device. If you device doesnt have a trackpad, you will need to modify the settings prior to start.
This version does not yet support remote highscores
Do not send highscore to central server
You name to set in the highscore list
I just made a new highscore of
Do not ask to send highscore.
Ask to send highscore to twitter/facebook/etc.

1.0.7

-Added highscore system, make sure to set your name in the settings panel

1.0.8
-Added twitter/facebook/messages support. Can be disabled in the settings menu.

1.0.9
- New control type: Touchscreen. Use the 4 sides of the screen (Around the middle) to control the snake. Use settings to choose the control method. NOTE: Users who did choose previously a different controller need to update their settings again!
- Hide walls when not playing

1.0.10
- Fixed a small layout bug.
